thread.title: Condor Liberation not sailing today
thread.title_full: Condor Liberation not sailing today | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Condor Liberation not sailing today
text:
The Condor Liberation won't be sailing today.
The service was cancelled on Saturday so that further engineering inspections can take place.
Customers who were going to travel on the ferry have been provided with accommodation and are either travelling tomorrow or Thursday.
Today's cancellation comes after a weekend of problems for Condor with services delayed on Friday and cancelled on Saturday and Sunday.
Last updated Tue 22 Sep 2015 Read more 21 updates Condor Liberation services cancelled after mechanical issues Travel Guernsey Jersey
